entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule

[DQC.IFRS.0080.8553] ifrs-full:PaymentsToAcquireOrRedeemEntitysShares has a value of -261,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.

[DQC.IFRS.0102.9540] Attività with a value of 1,717,103,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Assets and Noncurrent assets ( 256,710,000 + 1,430,196,000 ) with a value of 1,686,906,000. These values should be equal. If assets held for sale is included in the Statement of Financial Position presentation, then consider using CurrentAssetsOtherThanAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners instead of current assets.
